author: larryi
msg: Update to use the new prompt specification attributes.

author: larryi
msg: Refactor to use introspection and customizable prompt specifications.  This
was the most flexible way to add support for the new keystorePass
attribute of Http10Connector.  Now PasswordPrompter can prompt for string
type attributes on most any module.

author: larryi
msg: Update checkSocketFactory() to set the module socketFactory when
obtaining an SSL socket factory, rather than using a local variable.  This
allows the PasswordPrompter add-on to work with the PureTLS updates.

author: larryi
msg: Track modules that need to be removed by context and update them to

author: hgomez
msg: Fix bug #6817 where RTLD_GLOBAL could be used but not present
Added also support for RTLD_NOW which could be also absent...
